original_title: 密着120日ドキュメント　禁欲覚醒 震える程のセックス断ちの果てに
overview: Our new queen returns after a 4-month absence. Aizawa Minami is a really impressive actress with the total package: face + body + acting. 2019 FANZA Best Actress award winner nonetheless  Now, IPX-342 is an almost 3-hour documentary style video supposedly filmed over a 120-day span (almost certainly not true), with an initial series of long interviews that span 43 minutes where she looks back at her career and life. The sex scenes are with supposed fans, hence the face pixelations, and also with the premise that Aizawa abstained herself from having sex for a long while.  An interesting scene was the one at minute 01:16:00 if only because she looked awesome in the OL attire. But perhaps the best was the soappy scene, that insane cowgirl style at minute 2:40:00 did it for me.
title: Intimate Documentary Filmed Over 120 Days. Awakening After Abstinence. Trembling With Pleasure After Abstaining From Sex. Minami Aizawa
